Mir ist auch bekannt, dass ich während d: I am also aware that I am obliged to, voluntarily and without delay, inform the court of any substantial improvements in my economic situation or a change of my address during the court proceedings and within a period of four years after the final decision or other termination of the proceedings. Increase of current income, that is not only a one off and of more than 100 euros (gross) per month must be reported. I must also report, voluntarily and without delay, if established deductions are reduced, when this reduction is not only a one off and the reduction is more than in 100 euros a month. I am aware that the granting of the legal or proceeding aid can be canceled in case of breach of this obligation, and that then I must pay back all the costs.
Mir ist bekannt, dass unvollständige ode: I understand that incomplete or inaccurate information may result in the cancellation of granting the legal and proceeding aid and criminal prosecution. The court may ask me to provide the missing documents later and to insure my statements under oath.
